block.p: Kimberley Ann Strassel and Matthew Justin Rose were married yesterday at the home of the bride's parents, Ann and Michael Strassel, in Buxton, Ore. Judge Leon S. Colas of the McMinnville (Ore.) Municipal Court officiated.
The bride and the bridegroom, both 27, work at The Wall Street Journal in New York. She is a features editor for the editorial page, and he is a reporter covering the publishing industry.

Kimberley Ann Strassel and Matthew Justin Rose were married yesterday at the home of the bride's parents, Ann and Michael Strassel, in Buxton, Ore. Judge Leon S. Colas of the McMinnville (Ore.) Municipal Court officiated.
The bride and the bridegroom, both 27, work at The Wall Street Journal in New York. She is a features editor for the editorial page, and he is a reporter covering the publishing industry.
Ms. Strassel, who is keeping her name, graduated from Princeton University.

Mr. Rose graduated with first class honors from Oxford University and received a master's degree in international studies from Johns Hopkins University. He is a son of Susan and Philip Rose of London.
